aboutUs.subtitle: Discover our journey, heritage, and future plans. We passionately develop innovation and quality for drivers.

section1.subtitle: About Us
section1.title: Souest - Automotive Industry Leader
section1.text: Soueast is a Chinese automobile manufacturer established in 1995. Originally founded as a joint venture between China Motor Corporation and Fujian Motor Industry Group. Mitsubishi Motors joined the partnership in 2006. In 2021, Mitsubishi withdrew from Soueast, which was subsequently acquired by Chery and now produces vehicles under the Jetour brand.

section2.subtitle: History
section2.title: Our Innovative Journey
section2.text: Founded in 1995. Partnership with Mitsubishi Motors began in 2006. Mitsubishi withdrew in 2021. Acquired by Chery in 2024 and now produces vehicles under the Jetour brand.

section3.subtitle: Products
section3.title: Our Vehicle Lineup
section3.text: The company has developed a range of models including SUVs and sedans. For example, Soueast offers S07 and S09 model vehicles.

section4.subtitle: Future
section4.title: New Chapter
